00029 class wxString;
00030 class wxSizer;
00031 class wxTextCtrl;
00032 
00033 #include "SimpleMono.h"
00034 
00035 class EffectWahwah:public EffectSimpleMono {
00036 
00037  public:
00038    EffectWahwah();
00039 
00040    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00041       return wxString(_("Wahwah..."));
00042    }
00043    
00044    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00045       std::set<wxString> result;
00046       result.insert(wxT("http://lv2plug.in/ns/lv2core#ModulatorPlugin"));
00047       return result;
00048    }
00049 
00050    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00051       return wxString(wxT("Wahwah"));
00052    }
00053 
00054    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00055       return wxString(_("Applying Wahwah"));
00056    }
00057    
00058    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00059    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00060 
00061    virtual bool PromptUser();
00062    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00063    
00064  protected:
00065    virtual bool NewTrackSimpleMono();
00066 
00067    virtual bool ProcessSimpleMono(float *buffer, sampleCount len);
00068 
00069    float phase;
00070    float lfoskip;
00071    unsigned long skipcount;
00072    float xn1, xn2, yn1, yn2;
00073    float b0, b1, b2, a0, a1, a2;
00074 
00075 /* Parameters:
00076    freq - LFO frequency 
00077    startphase - LFO startphase in RADIANS - usefull for stereo WahWah
00078    depth - Wah depth
00079    freqofs - Wah frequency offset
00080    res - Resonance
00081 
00082    !!!!!!!!!!!!! IMPORTANT!!!!!!!!! :
00083    depth and freqofs should be from 0(min) to 1(max) !
00084    res should be greater than 0 !  */
00085 
00086  private:
00087    float freq, startphase;
00088    float depth, freqofs, res;
00089 
00090 friend class WahwahDialog;
00091 };
00092
